title: RT News - October 28, 2019 (17:00 MSK)
text: Donald Trump announces the successful elimination of ISIL chief Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi. The Russian defense ministry, though, has cast doubt on certain aspects of the operation while some countries warn that the terror group still poses a threat. The EU agrees to extend the UK's Brexit deadline by another three months, as British lawmakers prepare to vote on the prime minister's request for a December general election. Hong Kong is gripped by a 21st consecutive weekend of violent protests. We look at how the unrest is driving money away from that financial hub towards strictly-governed Singapore.
description: Donald Trump announces the successful elimination of ISIL chief Abu Bakr al-Baghdadi The Russian defense ministry, though, has cast doubt on certain aspects of the operation while some countries warn that the terror group still poses a threat
